review_text:
Our time at the Mosquito Park Condo was great! Felt right at home. Great experience.
Will stay here again.
Wonderful place to stay. Clean and comfortable. Great location. John responds prompts to and questions. Highly recommend this condo!

Lovely place! Not only did it have a gorgeous view of Mosquito Park and the river, it was a quick drive to work (the hospital). The place was perfect for us as medical travelers because it was extremely well stocked with anything you could need.
John was a wonderful host and the space was perfect. The views of the river were so pretty. John had a few staples in the kitchen and that was a wonderful addition to such a quaint home

We got caught in bad weather and ended up checking in late. Checking was so clear that we had no problem getting in. Also, because it was so late, we had no chance to grab extras, but John had it covered already. Everything was provided. Even fast Internet/WiFi.
John made our visit wonderful in such a charming and beautiful home. We will definitely be to stay again on next visit.
Thank you for allowing us to stay in your beautiful home and making us feel welcome.

A good place. It is an old place so it comes with all of those pros and cons. The house has a lot of character, but we had everything we needed. The host checked in via texts frequently to make sure everything was good for us and even approved a change in our reservation plans. Overall a really solid stay for the price.

The property is in a quiet historic neighborhood with a view of the Mississippi. The house itself is historic, over 130 years old, so has lots a charm and character. It creaks and has some cracks in the plaster, but that adds to the home and is not unexpected. The house was extremely clean and had everything needed including kitchenware, games, and books. The host was very responsive and provided clear instructions, which made getting into and enjoying the home simple. The location is close to downtown and within 10 minutes of anything in Burlington. Recommend walking the neighborhood to look at the old homes. Overall a great stay and first time using AirB&B. Would definitely go back if staying in the area.
This is the most well equipped air bnb I've ever stayed at, would love to stay again!! Such good communication too, and a neat location.
Great spot for photos . walkingdistance to downtown and Mosquitoe Park and Snake alley
stayed there for 5 months, I believe that I couldn't find a better place to stay there for that long, and John made it easy..... overall a perfect place to stay!!!

Neat place with a lot of personality and character. Nice views of the Mississippi. Need to be able to climb stairs well to reach bedrooms. Good kitchen stocked with pots and pans some basic cooking staples.
overall a nice area and place to stay....
Nice Place to Stay!
overall great place, great quiet area .... I will definitely come back to Mosquito Park Condo ...

Great place, close to downtown. Burlington is a nice little quaint city on the mighty Mississippi. Definitely a hidden gem! Would definitely stay here again. Owner gave me some great recommendations on places to eat! La Tavola was great and thanks for getting me a reservation John! You’re the best!

This condo was amazing! It was very clean and was more than big enough to fit our party of 5. We spent mornings walking the neighborhood and evening sitting around the table playing cards. It was easy to check into and spotless. The beds were comfortable and plenty of linens and pillows were provided. The kitchen was fully stocked and had more spices available than most AirBNB homes we have been to. We use AirBNB 3-4 times per year and more than once we commented that the amenities here were the best we have seen. The water took a minute to warm up but once it did, there was plenty for multiple people to shower without running out. The towels were mis-matched but large and soft and there were several of them. We felt right at home. John is a very responsive host and went above and beyond to make sure we had a great time celebrating our sons 21st birthday. If we come back to visit again before the end of his internship, we will definitely rent this condo again! Thanks John!
Location was perfect for us Second time at this location First time with John Could not have gone any better Thanks

My recent stay was a mixed experience. While it had a certain charm and authenticity that added to the overall atmosphere, I couldn’t overlook some concerns that affected my stay.
On the positive side, the home exuded a cozy vibe with its old-world charm. The interior had a unique character, and there were some interesting architectural details that reflected the history of the place. Additionally, the location was quite convenient, with easy access to nearby park and just a short walk from downtown.
However, it’s important to address the downsides. The townhome was in need of maintenance and updating. The bathroom, in particular, showed signs of needed improvements especially in regards to water pressure and shower in general. The kitchen needs a dishwasher, which would help ensure dishes throughout the home were clean for the next guest. Lastly, I would suggest that all new/matching towels be purchased and remove all religious pictures, idols, and paraphernalia.
This is one of our favorite places to stay when we visit Burlington. The apartment is spacious and very clean. Jeff is the best host!

This place was just awesome!! We felt right at home and totally enjoyed our stay. Jeff and his parents were very helpful, accommodating and pleasant. We had wonderful conversations with Jeff's Mom and Dad. We would most definitely come back to this place!!
Easy to get to. Clean and quiet! Great location. Nice host.
As always its been great!! Thanks for the stay

Jeff was great! He was friendly and flexible and gave us some great recommendations on things to do in the area. The apartment is within easy walking distance of several good restaurants. We would definitely stay here again!

Jeff's place in Burlington is ideally located near the recently renovated downtown. Unique shops,restaurants , and a theater round out the quaint area. The actual apartment was quite spacious as previously mentioned. We especially liked the balcony off the master bedroom with views of the river. Jeff was very quick to respond, especially when we misplaced the key and he promptly drove over and let us in. We would recommend this rental without reservation.

We have stayed here many times. The location is great. Walkable to several restaurants, bars, coffee shops and cute little locally owned downtown shops. Jeff is always quick to respond and easy to work with. The house is super clean and the beds are very comfortable. Just as pictured.
Great place, location, and owner. Book it!

Great location and really cool space! The pictures do not do this place justice. This place was much bigger than I expected and the layout is super cool and spacious. Had everything we needed and was very clean which is always appreciated with a baby. Close to some great restaurants and shops and has a nice view of the bridge. Thank you for a great stay in Burlington!
This is a great meeting spot for family and friends. Always clean and plenty of room to gather. Highly recommended!
I stayed for 1 night and the place is very nice and Jeff was very helpful. Great location, clean, and spacious. I will definitely stay here again if I am in Burlington again.
Jeff is the best host! Great location and super clean!!!
I felt at home and satisfie

I felt welcomed. Jeff's father, Sam, was delightfully positive and we hit it off immediately. The view of the Mississippi River bridge was really great. I grew up in Burlington so my visit after a 30 year absence was pretty awesome. This place made my stay feel more like home versus the atmosphere of a motel hotel situation. We were able to cook for ourselves and catch Iowa Hawkeyes football game on the television. I will be back for sure.
Enjoyed our stay again!! Thanks so much

what a gem right by the Mississippi River. We were so comfortable. Jeff was an amazing host with many ideas of places to see! If you stay here, you must check out The Drake next door. That food is A+!
VERY NICE PLACE

This place was amazing, Jeff responded fast and communicated very well. When I come back to this area I’ll definitely be looking to stay at Jeff’s place. Host was also accommodating with check out time. Thanks a lot for the experience Jeff.
We had a great time staying at Jeff’s place. It was clean and very spacious. A fun location downtown near the river. Would recommend!
We love Jeff’s place and will be back again soon!

Wonderful stay here! The apartment was spacious and very clean. The kitchen had everything we needed when we decided to prepare a meal. We all loved the location — nice area to walk around and look, shop, and have breakfast at Bean Counter.
Beautiful, clean place downtown, walking distance to the Drake restaurant which is very good.

Nice space. Great host. The neighborhood has quite a bit of construction right now (7/23) and some is the locals outside after 10 did not make for a feel safe entry.
However the space was great, and the host made everything easy and comfortable. 5 stars!
loved the location and river view
Excellent place to stay. Great view of Mississippi River. Very comfortable and felt like home. Will definitely stay here again

We were very pleased with our stay here. It's a good sized apartment and it's absolutely beautiful on the inside. Jeff was very nice and responsive with texts sent back and forth, he even sent us text that the apartment was ready so could check in earlier than the 3pm time. We would most definitely stay there again.

My husband and I really enjoyed our stay at Jeff's place, it was super cute and very clean. It was also spacious and I loved the exposed brick walls. It's right downtown so there are quite a few restaurants and shops within walking distance. You can see the river from the little balcony which was cool. If you need a place to stay in Burlington I highly recommend Jeff's place. Thanks so much for your hospitality!
Very nice plates and bowls. I dig the fancy black squares.

Beautiful & spacious with great access to downtown and a beautiful view of the bridge & auditorium from the relaxing 3rd floor balcony. Jeff's communication was great & everything was perfect. Thank You!
Great!

We have stayed here before and will stay here again. The location is great. Walkable to all shops, restaurants and bars downtown. We also really enjoy sitting out in one of the 2 small balconies and watching the river flow by. Jeff is very accessible and accommodating. The unit is exactly as pictured and very clean. We stayed with our daughter, her husband and 2 small grandkids ( in sleeping bags) and we have more than enough space.
Wow! The apartment is so spacious. Very clean. Everything seemed new inside. Jeff was amazing to bring us extra pillows & coffee. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Would highly recommend.

What a wonderful house in a wonderful city! This home is HUGE for a downtown apartment. Having 3 bathrooms was one of the biggest perks on our girls weekend, as everyone had plenty of space to get ready.
Beautiful views, walk-able to great restaurants, room to spread out, responsive host! This had it all. Thank you for a great stay!
Very we’ll maintained. Great for 2 couples to stay. Jeff is very responsive to enquiries.
Nice place, close to the attractions of downtown Burlington. Very spacious and comfortable. I would stay here again.
Jeff was very kind and made sure I was set up for success!

My husband and I came to Burlington for a show at The Washington Theater (2 blocks away!), we absolutely LOVED our stay at Jeff's apartment!
The space is huge - it's 2 levels and it is gorgeous! Perfectly restored, the brick walls and beautiful ceilings are really cool, the beds were so comfy and everything was spotless!
Check in was simple, directions were very clear and Jeff called prior to our visit to touch base, his personal touch and flexibility were amazing!
We cant wait to come back this summer when we can sit on the patio, listen to nearby live music and relax with a beautiful view of the Mississippi river!
Great host and place to stay! Plenty of room and felt like a home away from home. Easy parking and walking distance to several shopping and dining options.
Large, very comfortable home. Easy downtown location.
Great stay, minutes away from restaurants and activities
Great place and host!
Our favorite place to stay in Burlington!

The apartment was actually more spacious than I thought. It was a prefect location to have Christmas with my daughter's that I haven't seen since before covid.
We could see the Mississippi from the window which was nice.
The location was right off the freeway.
Only issue was one window was loose and it was very cold outside,but we did not notify Jeff about it.
We had a great weekend here! Very nice location and Jeff is very responsive! We will definitely be back!
Jeff is a great host! We are repeat customers and will be back!

We stayed just one night. The apartment was so much more than a hotel for the night. Super comfy beds. The living room was comfortable. Loved having 2.5 bathrooms, 4 of us stayed. Nice downtown location and a view of the Mississippi.
Great place to stay and while in or around Burlington. Everything that you may want or need is just a short distance away

Great location, very spacious living area and two separate bedrooms, each with own bathroom/shower upstairs. Two convenient reserved covered parking spaces across the street in a public garage. Very clear communication from Jeff on location and use of the unit. One caution for potential guests; access to second floor entry at rear of the building is via open grate steel stairway which might pose an accessibility for some; but was not one for us seniors. Would stay here again, location is perfect and only several blocks to great restaurants. Highly recommend The Good Restaurant!

Very clean, large apartment. The bedrooms are both the size of master bedrooms. Jeff was easy to work with and made sure our check in went smooth. The apartment is close to near by restaurants and a nice view of the river. We would definitely stay again.
Spacious, very clean, great accommodations. Big enough for a large group of people (2.5 bathrooms!!) For a weekend hang out in downtown Burlington. Great area, great views. Highly recommend.

Jeff’s place is the perfect location to stay if you ware wanting to walk to everything in downtown Burlington. Very spacious and has all the amenities you will need for your stay. We enjoyed our stay and will definitely stay there again the next time we visit Burlington.

This is a great place to stay! The downtown location has everything from restaurants and nightlife to quick freeway access. The two bedroom, two and a half bath was more than enough room for all four of us. Jeff is a super host!

This is an amazing place to stay. We liked it enough to stay again and Jeff was just as nice and clean as the first time. This is an amazing bang for your buck and doesn’t have a massive cleaning fee. It is one of the cleanest places we have stayed recently.
This place is awesome. The owners are super to work with. The area down by the river is really neat. Would recommend to all.
Great stay in an amazing place!
Love staying here! Great location, lots of space and always accommodating! Will be back soon!

Clean and spacious, great location, definitely coming back!
Awesome stay!

This is one of those locations where upon arrival you ask, "Wait, I get all of this?" It was perfectly located for events happening at the Capitol Theater, and so many places within walking distance! Very clean and quite spacious!

This is literally the coolest place! It is so spatious and spread out that even with four people, there was plenty of room for everyone to have their own area. Its also right by the river so great views and great bars and restaurants within a 5 minute walk! Fun city was about a 5 minute car ride away. The bed was soooo comfortable too!

This is a huge and gorgeous space. You will have to climb some metal stairs to get to it, but if that’s OK, it is well worth it. It’s on two floors, with the bedrooms upstairs. It’s basically the size of a large two bedroom apartment, with plenty of class, amazing views, right next to a great restaurant. You can look out the master bedroom onto the bridge that crosses the Mississippi River.
Good location with clean and spacious accommodations! Host was great at communication as well. We would recommend this apartment and would definitely return.
Spacious and very clean. Great location. Great host. Definitely will book again!
This is an absolutely stunning apartment. Roomy, clean and perfect location. We will definitely return!

Great place to stay. I stay often when in town working. Walking distance to many great restaurants and on Thursdays the farmers market is fun!! The unit is spacious,clean and homey. I love the view of the river from the balcony deck. You have to be able to manage stairs. Great place to stay!
Great place and great location!
Very convenient and spacious place. Highly recommend

Highly recommend this location! Downtown Burlington, parking was a breeze - must be able to navigate stairs. The unit is so much larger than I could have imagined, very clean. Loved two levels of living and have everything we would have needed if we had stayed in for a weekend.

As many of the other comments, we were amazed at the spacious rooms. The apartment was so comfortable and nicely appointed. Just a note that if stairs are difficult for you then this location will be challenging. There are two flights to the "front" door and another inside to the bedrooms. Other than stairs, we had a wonderful stay.
Beautiful with the comfortable beds ever! loved this place highly recommend starting here. beautiful of the Colarado River. I would live here if I could. You love everything about spacious place.
Local gem, well located, well furnished. Stairs are required for this property!
This is a wonderful space. Plenty of room - wonderful for an extended stay. The rooms are super comfortable and beautifully decorated. Great view from the east bedroom.
What a deal! It is in a great location and nicely furnished. Book here!
Unit is very spacious and clean. Tastefully decorated. Easy check-in/check-out process. Jeff is a fantastic host. Very attentive. Responds quickly to questions and communicates well. Thank you Jeff!
Great stay, great price, very spacious, great communication, and clean.
This is a wonderful place to stay. I can’t think of one bad thing to say about it. I highly recommend it.
Awesome stay!

This Airbnb was amazing very clean, huge, and decorated beautifully. Jeff was a great host and he responds back fast if you have any questions or concerns. Overall the pictures did this place no justice it’s very spacious and family oriented home for a vacation getaway. My family and I will definitely be back!
Great host!

Jeff's place is outstanding! Great location, wonderful places to eat near by if you don't use the HUGE kitchen. Super value with more elbow room than you'll ever need. Beds are heavenly, furniture is comfortable. Really feels homey! Highly recommend staying here.
This is a great apartment! Lots of space and everything you need. Jeff is a great host!
Nothing but good things from this Air B&B and the host Jeff!

This place is beautiful, quiet, and much larger than I expected. The location is convenient to most any place in town you'd want to go. Jeff was easy to communicate with and had quick response time. I will stay here again when it's available.
Have to say this was a perfect and spacious apt for the fam and I. Like Jeffs other location everything was as expected. Thanks
Great place! Super clean and perfect location

Very easy stay. Very comfortable and spacious. Well apportioned kitchen. Jeff was very friendly, communicative, and helpful.
We’ve stayed before and will stay again.
Great place and perfect location! It was within walking distance of everything we wanted to do :)
Love the proximity to everything! Jeff is always super accommodating and I will be back again!
We are a repeat customer. Great location, spacious, and Jeff is THE best host!
Great Airbnb and owner! I highly recommend this place. Clean, comfortable, and close to everything you need. I’m a repeat customer.
Great place at a great price! Large, clean, comfortable two-story, two bedroom apartment. Comfortable beds and great downtown location.

This airbnb was perfect for our weekend stay in Burlington! We were in town for a family wedding & took advantage of this beautiful location to enjoy happy hour at The Drake Restaurant, shopping at fun boutiques while staying downtown & even utilized the convenient store across the street a couple times! My favorite room was the kitchen, large enough for all of us to gather for morning coffee, meals & playing cards later in the evening. This apartment was fully equipped with both kitchen & bath necessities. I utilized the ironing board & iron as well & it even had two decks of playing cards which we had forgot to bring! Plenty of hot water while showering too!! Will definitely be back for another stay!! Thank You Jeff! You were a great host! Rosie Brueck Busta

Perfect location in downtown Burlington. We could easily walk throughout the entire town. The place was larger than expected and the price was reasonable for the size/amenities. Everything was clean and neat. Would definitely recommend staying here if you’re visiting Burlington.
We love staying here! Great location, plenty of space, and Jeff is a fabulous host!
A perfect location for a downtown Burlington experience. The home was larger and nicer than we expected. Walking distance to everything we wanted to experience in downtown.
Just like home. Comfortable clean quiet private
House is fully stocked and very clean. The location couldn’t be any better! Right downtown and close to many wonderful restaurants and things to do.

Jeff’s place is very spacious and incredibly clean. Two fantastic restaurants literally within a block or two, Drake’s and Good. There were a ton of adorable local shops just down the street and we had a great view of the bridge. Check in and out was contactless and easy, parking was convenient, cost was affordable. Couldn’t recommend the space more!!
Bery good location and a very nice place to stay
Place was clean and quiet!!!!! ❤️ it and would visit again
Great location to downtown! Very nice and clean. This way bigger than we expected. We'll definitely stay again.
Very nice and comfortable!
Beautiful and roomy apartment, well furnished and perfectly located close to the river and downtown attractions. Looking forward to our next stay.

Jeff, thank you so much. Everything was perfect we had a wonderful time at our BHS 50th reunion. Your apartment was the perfect location. It was so close to a restaurants and the perfect coffee shop. You were so helpful and gracious. We will be back!
Very nice spacious apartment in a central location. Everything just as advertised. Highly recommend.
First time staying in this unit. View of the Mississippi River and bridge are wonderful. Can’t wait to see it with snow falling. Jeff’s units are always clean and welcoming. Glad I found these places
Great place!!
Great location, clean and would definitely recommend. Five stars for sure.
This was far more than expected and we would highly recommend it. We plan to return next year and would like to stay again if available.
Clean, spacious, affordable. Owner is great to work with.
Great place with view on the river. I watched sunrise from the bed 😊.
Great place and amazing space with location. clean, spacious and accurate. will stay here again 100%
Roomy and spacious rental. Great value and location Has great choices for Wi-Fi. Has everything you need for a stay away from home.

Enjoyed our stay! Charming place. Everything was clean and welcoming. The toiletries and breakfast/coffee/tea were a wonderful surprise. Would recommend. Just a note: The place is on the 2nd floor, with bedrooms on the third floor, so this location has 2 stories of stairs.
Very spacious place in a convenient location. We are repeat customers. Jeff is the best host!

We had a great stay! The condo is exactly as pictured. Very spacious yet cozy. Suited our needs perfectly. We especially enjoyed sitting out on the balcony over looking the Mississippi River. Jeff is very friendly and also great at communicating. We look forward to going back again.
Very lovely place! Flexible with my check in and check and communication was excellent
Very spacious and comfortable. We felt like we had a home away from home.
Great place. Wonderful location. Quiet and relaxing apartment.
Beautiful condo. Great host. He was very kind.
Jeff's place is 5star. We've stayed multiple times! Never an issue!!
The apartment was great! Super spacious, clean, and a great location. We definitely enjoyed our stay for the short time we were there.
Great location. Very spacious and had everything you need.
Highly recommend Jeff’s place! Very clean and close to a lot of restaurants downtown!
This apartment was amazing! So spacious and warm...definitely exceeded our expectations.
Simply amazing place to stay! If i could give more than 5 stars i would. We will definitely stay here again when in town
Very good clean and spacious location. Everything was awesome. Will be back!
Perfect location, lots of space, and very nicely decorated
Great apartment, super clean and as described. It’s bigger than I thought it would be, I mean it’s huge. Nice view from the upper balcony of the river and bridge.
Jeff’s place was spacious and clean. It was in a prime location. We will be staying again for future soccer tournaments. Five stars all around! My kids loved it, too!
Incredible place. Spotless with everything you need. Within walking distance to many restaurants and bars. Book it!
This place was great! Just as expected and more for our group. Jeff was very responsive, had a list of local things to do available upon check-in and we really enjoyed the location!
Jeff goes above and beyond to accommodate you with whatever you need.
Clean and spacious! Great location!
Fantastic location and great place to stay!

This place is great! Awesome location right off the highway, and walkable to many local stores and Snake Alley. Big bedrooms each with their own bathroom and shower. I would highly recommend this place!
Super cute apartment!
The loft was much larger than I expected. Very comfortable, well furnished and well stocked. Parking was very convenient. Great location for any downtown activity. We had a great stay!
Great location and LOTS of space in this apartment.. I highly recommend! Jeff is wonderful to work with and will be back again soon!

Absolutely a great place to stay, went well beyond my expectations and the communication was great, and it was extremely clean. You can tell that the host put alot of care into his property. I highly recommend this host and property!
Conveniently located and very clean. Would definitely stay here again.
Highly recommend! This is a prime location, downtown Burlington. Such a hidden gem. The airbnb is as pictured if not better. I've stayed her on multiple occasions and it is always sparkling clean!
Repeat customer, and I plan on keeping it that way! Great stay again.
Place was very nice and clean
Great place. Clean and well appointed.
Another great stay at this fabulous apartment. It’s our favorite Airbnb in Burlington. Highly recommended!
I've stayed in two of Jeff's properties. They are both spacious, clean, and comfortable. Jeff always responds to messages quickly.
Amazing Place. Have a great time, will definitely be back

Being born and raised in Burlington, Iowa I can say that the location doesn’t get any better than this. Jeff has a beautiful downtown condo with all the amenities anyone could want. Not to mention his excellent taste in local recommendations (many of which were my personal favorites when I lived here), and exceptional hospitality.
Staying with Jeff you truly get a feeling of the quintessential Midwestern hospitality that Iowa is so well known for (which in my case makes you feel right at home :) )

This apartment is very spacious and nice, with the living space on one floor and the bedrooms on a second floor. Great downtown location for walking to the river and Snake Alley as well as restaurants.
Jeff's location is perfect for a downtown getaway. It's close to everything a person needs. And he provided a beautiful space and the cleanliness was exceptional. Will definitely go back.

We were in town for my daughter’s soccer tournament. Our family is not quite ready to stay in hotels during the pandemic, so we opted for an Airbnb. Jeff’s place was amazing. Sparkling clean, so comfortable, and a perfect location. Jeff responds very quickly and the check-in/check-out process couldn’t have been smoother. We will definitely be back. Thanks, Jeff!
Great place to stay, very clean and has everything you need. Recommend this place to anyone who is looking for somewhere to stay when they come to the Burlington area.
We enjoyed our stay at Jeffs place. It was especially spacious and clean. We found a great restaurant that was a lovely two block walk.
Great spacious apartment on the mississippi river and walking distance to all the downtown spots! Jeff is a great host!
Very nice would highly recommend and will definitely stay again!

One of the nicest Airbnb’s that we have been to. The place was spacious, clean, and beautifully decorated. Within a short walking distance to coffee shops, restaurants and Mississippi River. Would definitely stay again!

Beautiful apartment with a great view of the river. Very spacious and immaculate with great amenities. Jeff is a wonderful host, we will definitely be back to stay again. We would recommend this place to anyone coming to stay in Burlington.
Huge space - so clean and well appointed. Would highly recommend if you’re visiting Burlington!
Awesome
Great as usual!
Nice little hidden gem to stay in Burlington. Very spacious and clean.
Jeff is a great host! The place is spacious and spotless. We always enjoy our time here, and will be back again!
Great as usual!
Great stay, beautiful view of the river.

I stayed here for a weekend, and it was wonderful a beautiful apartment. Really the only kinda of a down side was there is a lot of spiders on the balcony. But other than that everything else was perfect.
Would highly recommend!

We love this place and highly recommend it! Lots of space and in such a great location in the heart of downtown. We had a great time sitting on the deck and watching the fireworks over the Mississippi.

This place has everything going for it. Sparkling clean, great amenities and close to everything in downtown Burlington. Hosts were excellent as well. I received immediate responses to any questions/concerns I had. Highly recommended!

The space was so clean and relaxing. Definitely a wonderful place to stay when your in town. Jeff was really great to work with, he made it very easy to communicate, with quick responses. We will definitely be staying anytime we make a trip to Burlington. Highly recommend!

We loved staying in this beautiful place. It’s very spacious, has beautiful river views and is in a fabulous location, close to our favorite restaurants and shops in downtown Burlington. The apartment has all the right touches (fluffy towels and washcloths, restaurant menus and recommendations, wastebaskets right where you need them, etc.) Jeff is a very responsive and accommodating host and clearly a pro at this. We highly recommend this apartment and look forward to staying there again.
Very nice and large place. Good location.
Wonderfully clean spot overlooking river. Stayed an extra night it was so enjoyable
Far better than any local hotel,with a better location. This huge immaculate apartment will not disappoint!
Best airbnb around. Has everything you need great location. River view. Will be back.
This is our favorite place to stay when we visit Burlington. Jeff is an awesome host!
Expect space!!! The room sizes are huge! Clean, well prepared, new furniture, comfortable beds!
Jeff is a very good host with an awesome apartment!

We were in town for the weekend for state and the apartment was the perfect place for our group of 4. Everything was sparkling clean and very spacious! Jeff was a very gracious host and even aloud us to do late checkout since bowling wasn’t until 4!! We truly couldn’t ask for a better place to stay or a better host!!
This place is great! We are returning customers, and will be back again.

Jeff's apartment was great and very spacious. Super clean, great decor, 2.5 bath was perfect for our stay! Great price for the space and size! Offered early check in, late check out, and allowed a one night stay! We will definitely stay here again if need a place in Burlington! Great home away from!

This space was much bigger than expected, as it was two stories, was very clean, and Jeff was very communicative throughout our stay. It was the perfect space for our trip. The restaurant we were attending an event at called Good was only 1 block away, and we were really close to downtown activities and the river as well. We would definitely stay again in the future.
This was our second stay and it was wonderful! We hope we can always stay here when visiting Burlington
Great space. Really close to the waterfront. Easy access. Lots of room. Cool brick walls. Thoughtful host. Nice amenities. Well taken care of.
Spacious, clean, fun location. Jeff is a great host. Highly recommend.
Wonderful place to stay in Burlington! We have stayed a few times and love it. Very spacious and clean with all of the amenities.
Great space and location! The place was spacious and the beds were comfortable. We will definitely stay here again!

This place is beautiful, roomy and so comfortable. There's a great view of the Mississippi from the back balconies, and the place is sparkling clean. There were clear instructions and loads of tips for things to do locally. We had a terrific time with our daughter.
Super clean and spacious. Great location within walking distance of many attractions.

The is an excellent place to stay! Very clean, incredibly spacious and the location in great! Both the master suites were huge! Jeff was great to work with always responding very quickly anytime I needed anything. The one thing you should note however is that there is an outside staircase up to the b & b and more stairs inside to get up to the bedrooms. No big deal to us but something to think about it you have trouble with stairs. Otherwise the place is outstanding!
Great place!
Great place to stay in Burlington!
Very nice and super clean. Be aware there are lots of stairs!
Jeff is an awesome host! He was very accommodating and the place is superb!!!! His place is huge and the location was perfect for our needs.
This was one of the best air bnb's we've ever stayed at! Super clean, super comfortable and spacious with a beautiful river view! 100% reccomend this air bnb to all!

This apartment on the river is the best accommodation in Burlington - at a very reasonable rate. As spacious as most homes and immaculately clean and well appointed, within easy walk of downtown amenities and just across the alley from the best restaurant in town, the Drake. Always my first choice when staying in Burlington. Thanks Jeff!

This apartment is the best place we've ever stayed at in Burlington. We've stayed at all the major name hotels in the area and find none more comfortable, clean, and welcoming. The apartment is located downtown near great restaurants and bars. There are wonderful places nearby that you can walk to for breakfast and it is one block from the river.
